summary: Implements a bottleneck residual unit for deep convolutional neural networks, featuring a three‑layer convolutional stack with batch normalization, activation, and an identity shortcut connection to facilitate gradient flow in very deep ResNet models.
business_intent: Provides a reusable component for building high‑performance image classification models such as ResNet‑50/101/152, enabling efficient training and deployment of deep residual architectures in computer‑vision applications.
